name: Wheelchair Big Size
description: Elderly woman aged 74 years old needs a Big size Wheelchair for her to move easily to do her daily chores.

name: Wheelchair Big Size
description: Elderly woman (73 years old) staying alone in Spooner Road, she needs a big size wheelchair for her to move about doing her daily chores.

name: Wheelchair
description: Middle-aged single mother with health conditions affecting her stamina and mobility. Wheelchair will allow daughter to ferry her to medical appointments and amenities.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Darren Pillai

name: Child Wheelchair
description:
Family consists of single mother and 5 young children living in a rental flat. Client's 7-year-old daughter had an accident several days ago resulting in bruising and 2nd-degree burns on her leg. The child is required to attend frequent follow-ups at the hospital in the next month and is unable to walk or put pressure on the injured leg. As the family has no mobility aids, the child currently moves by hopping on one leg, putting herself at risk of another injury. 

The family would benefit from the provision of a children's wheelchair to improve mobility, safety, and well-being of the child throughout her recovery. Thank you for supporting the family.
specifications: Wheelchair must be able to accommodate child's weight of 19kg

name: Wheelchair
description: Low-income family has an adult who requires a wheelchair to move around. However, his current wheelchair is faulty and is in need of a new one. You may whatsapp Jaslin at 97219039 if you have a spare one. Thank you!

name: Rollator
description: 70years old lady has limited mobility, she has to use wheelchair for long distances, she wants to have a rollator to practice walking so that she is able to walk more stably and be able to sit when she needs to rest.

name: Wheelchair
description: 65 years old Chinese female married and staying with her husband and daughter. Client is mostly homebound and is alone at home during the day, she experiences breathlessness whenever she ambulates in the Community. A wheelchair will help her to move around in the community.

name: wheelchair
description: Client and husband are both low-income earners, with 4 children, all aged below 16 years old. Their eldest son had recently injured himself, and recovery period is expected to be at least 6 months. The family had been encouraged to get a wheelchair to help with his mobility, but the family is unable to afford it. They are thus hoping to get a wheelchair to ease their son's recovery.(Kamie)
specifications: Able to withstand more than 105 kg

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Motorised Scooter
description:
Client is a cancer patient and staying alone. Client has some mobility issues. Thus, having a motorised scooter will allow client to go about his daily activities.

Note: Client can only use a motorised scooter that is able to support 100-150kg   in weight.

name: Elderly Toilet Side Bar Fixtures
description:
Female / 68 years old currently undergoing occupational therapy requires side bar fixtures for toilet. 

Fixtures such as:
1) Flip up Steel Grab Bar
2) FT Chrome Bathroom Grab Bar
3) Flip Up Shower Seat
4) Anti Slip Mats

Thank you! :)

name: Motorised Scooter
description: Patient (57/F) has difficulties walking due to frequent giddiness after dialysis and shortness of breath due to her health conditions. She has difficulty traveling on her own and hence she would usually not be able to go out much unless someone accompanies her. Hence having a motorised scooter will increase her ease of access in the community and allow her to travel safely and independently.

name: Wheelchair battery
description: Client is a 49-year-old woman living with her wheelchair-bound husband (M/67). Client is unemployed and does not receive any financial support from her family. Her husband is retired, and they have been surviving on his monthly CPF payouts. Her husband’s battery for his motorised wheelchair is faulty and they have not been able to replace it due to financial constraints. A donation of a wheelchair battery will be greatly appreciated. Thank you. (Liyana)

Their daughter has been in an out of hospital/clinics due to the skin condition and this strains the family's expensss further. Client plans to seek employment after her confinement ends to support the family. She used to work multiple jobs but currently is unemployed due to her pregnancy and caregiving issues for her toddler. With husband’s meagre income, they are unable to afford some of the basic necessities for their kids. The family is living in a 2 room rental unit. Hoping for kind donations for Merries Diapers Pants Size L (for 3 months worth).

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: Washing Machine
description: Family has 2 school-going children and son is diagnosed with speech delay and asthma. Client's husband does not contribute to the household and is often away for overseas deployment. The family's current washing machine is faulty and unable to afford the repair cost. Client is facing caregiving stress due to competing work demands and caregiving needs of her children.

name: Fridge
description: Single elderly has recently moved to a rental  unit without any financial means to purchase basic necessities. He wishes to have a small fridge for his daily usage. ZH

name: Hot & Cold Water Dispenser
description:
Client is a household of 6 family members. 
The sole-income earner takes on a low pay and the family is dependable on SSO Comcare financial assistance. 
The main caregiver is facing health issues and is unable to support the family's financial situation apart from the caregiving of the children. Having to struggle with basic needs, the family do not have additional finances to afford the purchase of a (i) hot water dispenser, (ii) laptop, (iii) air-fryer.

name: Portable cooler
description: Client is a single mother who is unemployed as she has to care for her young daughter. Client is struggling financially. Client request for a portable cooler for her daughter and her use.

name: Television
description: Family seeking a donation for a television as their current one was given previously by a friend but is breaking down.

name: Fridge
description: Client and husband form a low-income household with their 3 children. Her husband is the sole breadwinner while client takes on a part-time course while juggling her caregiving responsibilities. Recently, their fridge broke down, which affects their ability to keep food for longer periods of time. This means that at times, their food or meals are spoiled, which adds further burden to their financial constraints. Having a replacement fridge would thus ensure that their basic needs are met adequately daily. Halal fridge required, preferably new.

name: Wall Fan
description: Client has multiple medical conditions. Husband is a low wage earner and had recently been asked to leave his company. The family does not have enough for additional expense and recently, her wall fan is not functioning as well and is making it too noisy for her, causing her to feel even sicker and it gives her a headache and heavy migraine. A new fan would provide the comfort for recovery.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services @ Taman Jurong SSO
contact.name: Nur Sabrina Binte Aswan

name: TV
description: Family of 2 (mother and 11-year-old son) is requesting for a TV. The family will be shifting into their new rental flat which has no amenities.

name: Washing Machine (Top Load)
description: A single mother with two young children hope to seek your kind provision of a top load washing machine (8 kg). The family has finally gotten their keys to their rental flat and require support to refurbish their rental unit with basic necessities. Mother is the sole caregiver of her children and is currently relying on formal financial support to make ends meet. Your blessing of a top load washing machine is greatly appreciated. Thank you!

name: Washing Machine
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) is living in a rental flat and requires a second-hand washing machine as his current one is spoilt. 

     

On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a second-hand washing machine (top load). 

   

If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Caseworker Yu Xin at 8292 2205. We appreciate it if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s home directly at Circuit Road. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Washing Machine
description: My client is an senior on long term MC from IMH hence he is unable to work. His current washing machine has been spoilt for some time.

name: Washing machine
description: Mother of two young kids is in need of a washing machine. Due to medical reasons she is unable to work. She is in the midst of a divorce and is not receiving any support from her spouse.

name: Washing Machine Needed! (Top Load)
description: Client is a single mother, and the sole provider for her 3 school-going children.  Client earns a minimal income from her part-time employment, and as a result, the family experiences financial strains. The family requires a washing machine as their current one is faulty.

name: Washing Machine
description: Single lady, aged 48,with weakness in left arm, urgently requires a washing machine to wash her clothes. She has many clothes unwashed since her washing machine broke down recently. Donation required urgently.

name: Washing Machine
description: Family of 3 who recently moves in to their new interim rental flat. As they are currently residing in a temporary shelter, they do not own any washing machine. Hence, they require a washing machine for their new home.

name: Washing Machine

contact.name: Hernawatie Binte Abdullah

name: Washing machine
description: Family has a 9 month old child and had recently moved into their rental unit. Family would require a washing machine as they both have limited income to purchase electrical home appliances. Would appreciate donor to provide support for delivery please, thank you!

name: Tablet
description: Family of 3 requires a working tablet as K2 child with slight developmental delays has registered for additional classes with volunteers which helps her to prepare for P1 next year. Mother is unable to work and father cannot afford to purchase a tablet. They do not own any laptops and only father owns a handphone as he is working.

contact.name: Poh Mei Ying

name: CCTV for 22yo lady with Special Needs
description: Client has been diagnosed with Down Syndrome and is a student of MINDS. She lives with her mother (single mother) and another brother. Her mother has expressed concerns of client being unsupervised at home for about 4 hours as client's programme ends in the late afternoon while mother's work ends at night. There has been an incident of client using lighters at home and almost set the flat on fire. Mother has attempted to remove all hazardous items at home, but is concerned about similar incidents. Two CCTVs are requested to enable mother to check on client in the day even while working. Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much!

name: Mattress (Queen size)
description: Family of 5 living in a 3-room flat is requesting for a queen-sized mattress. Family is facing financial difficulty. Comprises parents, elderly mother and 1 adult child and 1 primary school child. Thank you very much.

name: Bed and mattress (unused)
description: Client is divorced with one child young child 12 years old. She just gotten her rental flat recently and would appreciate some donations to help her furnish her flat’s basic necessities. Thank you so much.

contact.name: Simranjit Kaur

name: Wardrobe (3door)
description: Client is divorced with one child young child 12 years old. She just gotten her rental flat recently and would appreciate some donations to help her furnish her flat’s basic necessities. Thank you so much.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Simranjit Kaur

name: Chest of drawers
description: Client lives in a 2-room rental flexi flat with her husband and 3 school going children and her father who is advanced in age and has health issues. Client is unemployed as she has to care for her two youngest children age 4 and 3 and they have learning difficulties. Client's husband is working and earns $1200 which is not enough to feed a family of 6 especially with client's father who have multiple chronic illness. Client requested for a chest of drawers. Storage to store her linens and clothes. As client has lack of funds, client is looking for donor who can sponsor for the delivery.

name: Kind size bed with storage
description: Client is the sole breadwinner supporting her family of 7 (5 young children). Client and her family are living in rental flat and client is a low wage income earner. Client requires a king size bed (preferable with storage function as they live in 2 room rental flat) mattress and bed sheet as the current one has sunken in and client is unable to afford. Appreciate if bed sheet is new as client has young children.

name: kitchen cabinet

contact.name: Yvette Lau

Do contact me at 98598768 for further liaison on delivery address etc, thank you very much.

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description: Low-income family with 2 young children (4 and 3 years old) need a new kitchen cabinet for their home. This would help them store their kitchen utility items safely and out of reach for their young children. Parents are experiencing job instability due to the COVID-19 pandemic, leading to a shortage in financial resources.

name: Wardrobe
description:
Preferred Dimensions:

3 Door + Drawer Wenge: 72"x44.9"x16.5"
OR
5 Door + Drawer Wenge: 72"x74.8'x16.5"

Low income family with 6 children looking for wardrobe for donation.

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre - Hougang
contact.name: Chan Jun Ren

name: Table Riser
description:
THK Pan-Disability Centre is a sheltered workshop for adults with special needs to learn social and vocational skills in order to gain employment in the open job market.
In 2020, we started a baking track. Although it was well received by clients, they did find it challenging to roll the dough over the table for a long period of time. In order to elevate the table to a more suitable height and prevent backaches, we would like to request for 12xTable Riser. Do reach out to us for more details of the type of table riser that we need. Thank you.

name: Wardrobe
description: A single parent with a school going child requires a wardrobe as her existing one is quite worn out. A wardrobe would enable family to keep their clothing in a proper place as family resides in a rental flat with limited space.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Chua Bee Guet

name: Bicycle
description: Family of 5 would like 2 second-hand bicycles for their teenager sons. Parents are struggling with sons' over exposure to digital devices and would like to use outdoor activities to distract them from using digital gadgets. Father is a Grab food delivery rider and mother is unemployed due to cancer treatment. Financially, they are also struggling to make ends meet and cannot afford 2 bicycles.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Yew Tee
contact.name: Calyn Xu

name: Adult Bicycle
description: Client is a 62 male who is currently homeless and sleeping in the open. Client is seeking employment but worries about transport and hopes to have a working bicycle so he can cycle to work. Client is familiar with foldable bicycle or MTB.

name: Adult Bicycle
description: Client has just found a job and requires a bicycle to commute to her workplace and also explore doing gran food delivery so that she could support the family.

name: Bicycle
description: The client is struggling with his mental health and finds it difficult to leave the house. However, he finds it less intimidating to leave his home on a bicycle. Riding the bicycle not only brings him from one point to another but it also helps him to better cope with his mental health. Donors please kindly contact his social worker Reuben at reubenyue@carecorner.org.sg or contact him at 6365 8751 if you wish to donate.

name: Household necessities
description:
Family of 9 with 4 young children (7mths to 10yrs). Father has been the sole breadwinner and family has been having difficulty coping financially.

Father and 3 children have just tested positive for Covid and are required to isolate at home. They require the following household necessities:

- Milk Powder: Dumex Step 1 and Step 3
- Fresh groceries
- ART test kits (they have already used up the kits provided by MOH)

Any assistance for either of the 3 items will be greatly appreciated!

Please feel free to Whatsapp/SMS me directly at 88318151. Thank you!

contact.name: Joanne Khoo

name: Food ration

Mother does not contribute financially to the family. Father hopes to get practical help on food rations for the family for the next 3 months. Kindly get in touch with me on the food ration list. Thank you

name: Motorised scooter
description: An elderly client is requesting for a motorized scooter as his previous motorized scooter has broken down for a while and he is unable to walk with a steady gait after inserting 10 screws in his back and leg when he fell from the 2nd floor in 1989 when he was working as an aircon electrician. He is permanently unfit for work and requires a motorized scooter to allow him to travel further in place of his wheelchair as he feels very trapped and isolated in his rental unit.

name: 24 bottles X 361g Smucker's sugar free jam (assorted flavor)

The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

Client and spouse consumes about 1.5 tins per 2 months or 9 tins each per year.

name: Mobile Phone
description: The beneficiary is in need of a mobile phone. No preference on the brand - phone preferable to have basic functions (eg. Call, whatsapp, camera etc). Please contact us for delivery details (email:dik@childrensociety.org.sg,contact:9436 7401). Thank you.

name: Diapers and food ration
description: Mother of two young children ages 5 and 3 is in need of XXL Drypants diapers and food ration for the family. Mother has a medical condition which makes her unfit for work. She is also separated from her husband due to safety concerns. As such, she is financially tight as he is not supporting the household.

name: Handphone & LCD monitor
description: Low income client seeking help to replace mobile phone and LCD monitor screen.

name: Multi Tier Cats Cage
description:
Client has many cats and would like to house them well so they would not be urinating around the house. 
She is considering to put some up for adoption.

name: Smart Phone (iPhone preferred)
description: Client is an elderly single male staying in a rental flat. Currently unemployment and seeking to find job. As rental flat does not have a home line, seeking job is challenging without a phone. Current phone was damaged due to an accident in a park and client is used to iPhone and does not know how to operate Android phones.

name: Urgent/ Short term - Help with halal meals for family on quarantine
description: A family with 3 young children are placed on home quarantine until 29/9 and they have lack of informal support to purchase meals. Mother is feeling stressed in taking care of the children on her own at home. The family is residing in a rental flat as they have financial difficulties. Any help with providing meals delivery will be a great support to help the family tide through this period. Pls whatsapp me at 68010718 if it is more convenient. Thank you very much.

name: Wearable Tracking Device for 22yo lady with Special Needs
description: Client has been diagnosed with Down Syndrome and is a student of MINDS. She lives with her mother (single mother) and another brother. There have been multiple incident of client being reported missing after she wanders off on her own. A wearable tracking device is requested to enable mother to check on client's location as client does not bring a phone out of the house. Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much!

name: Enfapro A+ Infant Stage 1 Milk Powder
description: The baby needing the milk does not take other forms of milk well. However, this milk powder is more expensive. The baby is currently being cared for by a family friend, as the biological mother is incarcerated shortly after the baby's birth. Hence, the milk powder will help the guardian (who is a single mother) to provide for the baby's basic needs.

contact.org: Touch Community Services - Touch Family Enablement
contact.name: Deborah Ng

name: Working Laptop
description: Client with low income due to health issues wishes to seek employment and would require a laptop to create his resume.

name: eBike
description: A family with a toddler staying in their rental flat. Father is working as a delivery rider and his income fluctuates according to the availability of orders. They are tapping on financial support in order to make their ends meet. Father’s electric bicycle is not working and he requires one which is LTA approved to continue support the family. A second-hand one is perfect!

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Chua Pei Ching

name: Gas Stove
description: The family of four (two school-going teenagers) faces financial difficulties as both parents are certified medically unfit for work due to health and mental issues. Their gas stove is spoilt but are unable to afford a new one.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: Portable gas stove
description: Client is a single mother with 2 young children, residing in a 2 room rental flat. Client is unemployed due to caregiving needs and would require a portable gas stove to cook, to reduce their expenses. Please see here for a reference of gas stove: https://cf.shopee.sg/file/320c2b72382588fd055196f95cd255c1

name: Freestanding Gas Cooker and Oven
description: The family of four (two school-going teenagers) faces financial difficulties as both parents are certified medically unfit for work due to health and mental issues. Their gas cooker is spoilt but are unable to afford a new one. They hope to get a freestanding gas cooker that comes with an oven, so that the wife can bake and sell her bakes.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: Kitchen Aprons
description:
THK Pan-Disability Centre is a Sheltered Workshop for adults with special need. We provide vocational training in the hopes to ready them for the open job market.

In 2020, we started a baking track. As it is very well received, clients on our baking track have increase tremendously. Therefore, we are looking for more kitchen aprons for the clients. We are requesting for a minimum of 20 pieces 

Do reach out to us for further enquiries and clarifications.

name: 3M Tegaderm Film
description: 61 year-old single man living in a rental flat has end-stage kidney failure. He has a catheter attached to his body and needs Tegaderm film to cover it when he showers to prevent it from getting wet. The recurring cost of Tegaderm Film ($51/box x 2 boxes per month) is financially stressful for him, who is working as a part-time security guard.

name: KefenTech Plaster
description: 61 year-old single man living in a rental flat has end-stage kidney failure. He needs KefenTech plaster for body cramps after dialysis, which he goes for thrice a week. The recurring cost of KefenTech plasters ($109/box of 10x9 sheets) is financially stressful for him, who is working as a part-time security guard.

name: ART kit
description:
For clients from low-income family with children of age 5 -21 years old. With more testing needed during the current phase, low-income families would have difficulties affording more test kits, especially families with many children or families with young and old.

Donor could send the test kit to SHINE Children & Youth Services (Clementi):
329 Clementi Ave 2, 
#01-248, 
Singapore 120329

contact.org: SHINE Children and Youth Services - Clementi
contact.name: Gwen Ho

name: Blood pressure measuring machine
description: Patient aged 57, divorce with 1 daughter. Daughter is currently no longer in contact with patient. Patient is currently living together with the son in law and 5 grandchildren in a HDB govt 1 room rental flat. Patient has been the carer to 5 grandchildren but unfortunately, patient suffered a stroke in Sept 2021. Patient will need the blood pressure measuring machine to prevent recurrent stroke caused by uncontrolled hypertension.

name: Clothes
description: Please contact Social Worker Elizabeth at 8588 6196 during office hours or email to Elizabeth.Chia@thkmc.org.sg to liaise. Elderly male client needs clothing such as t-shirt, pants and shorts. Due to his numerous health conditions and medications, he has put on some weight. He has recently gone through surgery and is unable to leave his house at the moment. Client needs clothes sized XXL / XXXL. Client's waist size is 36. Thank you.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

name: Clothing for 10-12 year old Boys
description:
Family of 7 relies on sole income of father who works as a security guard. As father works in cash-pay jobs, income is often unstable and the family has to rely on SSO financial assistance to ensure basic needs are met. Without disposable income, the parents are unable to afford new clothes for the 10 and 11 year old boys who have outgrown their clothes. 

They would appreciate donation of clothing for the boys - top, bottoms, etc. Second-hand clothing are appreciated too. Thank you.
